title: HealthLink
description: HealthLink is a mobile application that uses machine learning to predict the likelihood of a user having a certain disease based on their symptoms. The app also allows users to book appointments with doctors and get health tips.

title: Cryptoverse
description: Cryptoverse is a web application that allows users to view the latest cryptocurrency prices, news, and trends. The app also provides users with a portfolio feature to track their cryptocurrency investments.
